price: Those who came before them rejected [the messengers]; then how severe was My response!
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīri
